professional.title: Professional Background
paragraphs: I am an accomplished Full Stack Developer specializing in JavaScript / TypeScript technologies, boasting over eight years of experience in the IT industry. Proficient in Node.js, React, Next.js, Express, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL, I bring a wealth of expertise to the table.

My capacity to swiftly grasp and assimilate new technologies seamlessly aligns with my analytical problem-solving skills. Over the course of my career, I have cultivated a comprehensive background and profound understanding of IT landscapes and systems.

With extensive experience in serverless architectures on AWS, I've built production-ready applications using Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, and EventBridge. I'm well-versed in implementing CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure-as-code practices with the Serverless Framework.

In addition, I possess substantial experience in providing guidance and instruction to clients within a professional software engineering environment. I take pleasure in imparting my knowledge to colleagues and co-workers, fostering a collaborative and knowledgeable team environment.

items.text: Loving husband and full time nerd, passionate about technology and continuous learning.
Enjoying nature and loving to travel and meet with friends and family. Prefer to do this with a minimal environmental impact.
Programming my own smart home with NodeRed, combining different standards with MQTT and RESTful APIs.
Also lover and active player of Scottish folk music, bringing rhythm to life.
I meditate on a daily basis and if time allows I draw, take photos and occasionally brew beer.
